refactor.description:
重构: 既不修复bug也不增加新功能的变更
Changes which neither fix a bug nor add a feature

fix.description:
修复bug: 修复问题的变更
Changes which patch a bug

feat.description:
新功能: 引入新功能的变更
Changes which introduce a new feature

build.description:
打包: 影响构建系统或外部依赖的变更。
例如：gulp, broccoli, npm
Changes which affect the build system or external dependencies.
Example scopes: gulp, broccoli, npm

chore.description:
构建过程或辅助工具的变动: 不直接影响用户的变更
Changes which are not user-facing

style.description:
代码格式: 不影响代码逻辑的变更，如空格、格式化、缺失分号等
Changes which do not affect code logic, such as whitespaces, formatting, missing semicolons

test.description:
增加测试: 添加缺失的测试或修复现有测试的变更
Changes which add missing tests or fix existing ones

docs.description:
文档注释: 影响文档的变更
Changes which affect documentation

perf.description:
性能优化: 提升性能的变更
Changes which improve performance

ci.description:
持续集成: 影响CI配置文件和脚本的变更。
例如：travis, circle, browser-stack, sauce-labs
Changes which affect CI configuration files and scripts.
Example scopes: travis, circle, browser-stack, sauce-labs

revert.description:
回退: 撤销之前提交的变更
Changes which revert a previous commit

footerTypes.name: BREAKING-CHANGE
footerTypes.description:
破坏性变更: 提交引入了破坏性API变更
The commit introduces breaking API changes

footerTypes.name: Closes
footerTypes.description:
关闭问题: 提交关闭了问题或拉取请求
The commit closes issues or pull requests

footerTypes.name: Implements
footerTypes.description:
实现功能: 提交实现了功能
The commit implements features

footerTypes.name: Author
footerTypes.description:
作者: 提交的作者
The commit's author

footerTypes.name: Co-authored-by
footerTypes.description:
共同作者: 指定的人共同撰写了提交的变更
The specified person co-authored the commit's changes

footerTypes.name: Signed-off-by
footerTypes.description:
签名: 签名可能证明提交者有权根据项目许可证提交工作，或同意某些贡献者声明，如开发者证书起源
A signoff may certify that the committer has the rights to submit the work under the project's license or agrees to some contributor representation, such as a Developer Certificate of Origin

footerTypes.name: Acked-by
footerTypes.description:
认可: 指定的人喜欢提交的变更
The specified person liked the commit's changes

footerTypes.name: Reviewed-by
footerTypes.description:
审核: 指定的人审核并完全满意提交的变更
The specified person reviewed and is completely satisfied with the commit's changes

footerTypes.name: Tested-by
footerTypes.description:
测试: 指定的人应用了提交的变更并发现它们达到了预期效果
The specified person applied the commit's changes and found them to have the desired effect

footerTypes.name: Refs
footerTypes.description:
引用: 提交通过其哈希ID引用了另一个提交。
对于多个哈希ID，使用逗号作为分隔符
The commit references another commit by its hash ID.
For multiple hash IDs, use a comma as separator
